name: Descendants of the Sun
summary: A love story between a soldier and a doctor in a war-torn country.

name: Goblin
summary: A tale of a goblin and a grim reaper who live for hundreds of years.

name: Crash Landing on You
summary: A South Korean heiress accidentally lands in North Korea and falls in love with a soldier.

name: Itaewon Class
summary: A young man seeks revenge and opens a bar in Itaewon, striving for success.

name: Reply 1988
summary: A heartwarming story of five friends and their families in the late 1980s.

name: Hotel Del Luna
summary: A hotel for ghosts becomes the setting for a supernatural love story.

name: Vincenzo
summary: An Italian lawyer and mafia consigliere seeks revenge in South Korea.

name: Moon Lovers: Scarlet Heart Ryeo
summary: A woman is transported back in time to the Goryeo Dynasty and becomes entangled in political intrigue.
